metadata.Title: CVE-2020-16589 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A head-based buffer overflow exists in Academy Software Foundation OpenEXR 2.3.0 in writeTileData in ImfTiledOutputFile.cpp that can cause a denial of service via a crafted EXR file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-16589` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenexr22 - 2.2.0-11.1ubuntu1.4
openexr - 2.2.0-11.1ubuntu1.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openexr package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.0-11.1ubuntu1.4').
